# SharkNetX

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SharkNetX is to provide tools for network subgraph comparison and analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of SharkNetX from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("iraiosub/SharkNetX")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to:

```{r example}
library(SharkNetX)

```
